thread.title: Walmart seeks drone tech to manage food supply

title: Walmart seeks drone tech to manage food supply
text:
Walmart seeks drone tech to manage food supply 3:11pm IST - 02:11 
Walmart Inc. applied for six patents last year for drones that aim to prevent damage to crops, control pest attacks on farms and cross-pollinate plants, a sign the retail behemoth is trying to improve its supply chain in the increasingly competitive market for fresh food.
